mapper.select: select Course.course_id, course_name, course_start_year, course_is_archive, student_class, COUNT(Student.student_class) AS student_number from Course, Student, SC where SC.course_id = Course.course_id AND SC.student_id = Student.student_id AND teacher_id = #{teacher_id} GROUP BY SC.sc_id

select Course.course_id, course_name, course_start_year, course_is_archive, student_class, COUNT(Student.student_class) AS student_number, teacher_name from Course, Student, SC, Teacher where SC.course_id = Course.course_id AND SC.student_id = Student.student_id AND Course.course_id = #{course_id} AND Teacher.teacher_id = Course.teacher_id GROUP BY SC.sc_id
